title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5705.6 - Damaging authority property
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5705.6 - Damaging authority property

State Regulations

No person shall damage, mark or deface the facilities, or any
structure or appurtenance, owned or under control of the
authority. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
5705.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
